nodes.id: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

zh-cn: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 巴西左翼政治家，巴西劳工党创始成员，曾于2003年至2010年担任巴西第35任总统，并于2023年起再次担任第39任总统。他是巴西历史上第一位工人出身的总统。
description.en: A Brazilian left-wing politician and founding member of the Workers' Party, who served as the 35th President of Brazil from 2003 to 2010 and began his term as the 39th President in 2023. He is the first working-class president in Brazilian history.

description.zh-cn: 巴西极右翼政治人物，巴西第38任总统，在2022年巴西大选中被卢拉击败。
description.en: A Brazilian far-right politician who served as the 38th President of Brazil and was defeated by Lula in the 2022 Brazilian general election.

description.zh-cn: 巴西政治人物，巴西第36任总统。在卢拉首任总统期间，她曾担任其幕僚长（民政院首席部长），后接替卢拉成为总统。
description.en: A Brazilian politician who served as the 36th President of Brazil. During Lula's first presidency, she was his Chief of Staff and later succeeded him as president.

description.zh-cn: 巴西联邦法官，因在“洗车行动”腐败调查中主导对卢拉的审判并将其定罪而闻名。后在博索纳罗政府中担任司法和公共安全部长。
description.en: A Brazilian federal judge known for presiding over the trial of Lula and convicting him in the 'Operation Car Wash' corruption investigation. He later served as Minister of Justice and Public Security in the Bolsonaro administration.

description.zh-cn: 巴西的一个左翼政党，由卢拉及其他工会领袖、学者和知识分子于1980年创立。
description.en: A left-wing political party in Brazil, founded in 1980 by Lula and other trade union leaders, academics, and intellectuals.

description.zh-cn: 巴西一项自2014年开始的大规模反腐败调查，导致包括前总统卢拉在内的多名政商界人士被调查和定罪。
description.en: A massive anti-corruption investigation in Brazil that began in 2014, leading to the investigation and conviction of numerous political and business figures, including former President Lula.

description.zh-cn: 巴西的最高司法机关，拥有最终解释宪法的权力。
description.en: The highest judicial body in Brazil, with the power of final interpretation of the Constitution.

description.zh-cn: 巴西于2022年10月举行的总统选举。卢拉在该选举的第二轮投票中击败时任总统博索纳罗，赢得其第三个总统任期。
description.en: The presidential election held in Brazil in October 2022. Lula defeated the incumbent president, Jair Bolsonaro, in the second round of voting to win his third presidential term.

nodes.id: 2023年巴西国民议会遭冲击事件

zh-cn: 2023年巴西国民议会遭冲击事件

description.zh-cn: 在卢拉就任总统后，时任前总统博索纳罗的支持者冲击了位于巴西利亚三权广场的最高法院、国会和普拉纳托宫，以表达对选举结果的不满。
description.en: Following Lula's inauguration, supporters of the former president Jair Bolsonaro stormed the Supreme Court, National Congress, and Planalto Palace in Brasília's Three Powers Plaza to protest the election results.

nodes.id: 巴西军人独裁统治时期

zh-cn: 巴西军人独裁统治时期

description.zh-cn: 指1964年至1985年期间，巴西由军政府实行独裁统治的时期。卢拉在此期间是反对军政府的工人运动的主要组织者之一。
description.en: Refers to the period from 1964 to 1985 when Brazil was under a military dictatorship. Lula was one of the main organizers of the labor movement against the military government during this time.

description.zh-cn: 卢拉在其首任总统期间推行的一项旨在消除饥饿和极端贫困的社会福利计划。
description.en: A social welfare program implemented by Lula during his first presidency aimed at eradicating hunger and extreme poverty.

description.zh-cn: 卢拉政府推出的一项社会福利计划，向贫困家庭提供财政援助。
description.en: A social welfare program introduced by the Lula administration that provides financial aid to poor families.

nodes.id: 联合国人权事务委员会

zh-cn: 联合国人权事务委员会

description.zh-cn: 联合国负责监督《公民权利及政治权利国际公约》落实情况的机构。该委员会认定对卢拉的起诉侵犯了其合法权利。
description.en: The UN body that monitors the implementation of the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights. The committee found that the prosecution of Lula violated his legal rights.

nodes.id: 玛丽亚·德·卢尔德·里贝罗

zh-cn: 玛丽亚·德·卢尔德·里贝罗

description.zh-cn: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦的第一任妻子，因肝炎在怀孕期间去世。
description.en: The first wife of Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, who died of hepatitis during pregnancy.

nodes.id: 马利萨·莱蒂西亚·达席尔瓦

zh-cn: 马利萨·莱蒂西亚·达席尔瓦
马里萨·莱蒂西亚·席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦的第二任妻子，于2017年因脑中风逝世。
description.en: The second wife of Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, who passed away in 2017 due to a stroke.

description.zh-cn: 社会学家，路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦的第三任妻子。
description.en: A sociologist and the third wife of Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva.

description.zh-cn: 美国第46任总统。
description.en: The 46th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国第43任总统。
description.en: The 43rd President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 由金砖国家（巴西、俄罗斯、印度、中国和南非）成立的多边开发银行。
description.en: A multilateral development bank established by the BRICS states (Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa).

description.zh-cn: 巴西联邦共和国，南美洲最大的国家。
description.en: The Federative Republic of Brazil, the largest country in South America.

relationships.source: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 1980年2月10日，卢拉与一些工会领袖、学者和知识分子共同创立了劳工党。
description.en: On February 10, 1980, Lula, along with other trade union leaders, academics, and intellectuals, co-founded the Workers' Party.

relationships.source: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 卢拉作为劳工党的创始成员，曾先后担任该党第1任和第4任全国主席。
description.en: As a founding member of the Workers' Party, Lula served as its 1st and 4th National President.

relationships.source: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 卢拉曾担任巴西第35任（2003-2011）和第39任（2023至今）总统。
description.en: Lula has served as the 35th (2003-2011) and 39th (2023-present) President of Brazil.

relationships.source: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦
relationships.target: 巴西军人独裁统治时期

description.zh-cn: 在巴西军事独裁时期，卢拉是最大规模罢工的主要组织者之一，并领导了反对右翼军政府独裁的工人运动。
description.en: During the Brazilian military dictatorship, Lula was one of the main organizers of the largest strikes and led the labor movement against the right-wing military government's dictatorship.

relationships.source: 洗车行动
relationships.target: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 在“洗车行动”调查的背景下，卢拉于2017年被判犯有洗钱和贪污罪并入狱，直至2021年相关判决被宣告无效。
description.en: In the context of the 'Operation Car Wash' investigation, Lula was convicted of money laundering and corruption in 2017 and imprisoned, until the convictions were annulled in 2021.

relationships.source: 塞尔吉奥·莫罗
relationships.target: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 联邦法官塞尔吉奥·莫罗在“洗车行动”调查中审判并判处卢拉九年半监禁。
description.en: Federal Judge Sérgio Moro tried and sentenced Lula to nine and a half years in prison during the 'Operation Car Wash' investigation.

relationships.source: 巴西最高法院
relationships.target: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 巴西最高法院法官于2021年3月裁定原审法院不具审理权限，宣告对卢拉的判决无效，恢复了其政治权利。
description.en: In March 2021, a Brazilian Supreme Federal Court justice ruled that the original trial court lacked jurisdiction, thereby annulling Lula's convictions and restoring his political rights.

relationships.source: 联合国人权事务委员会
relationships.target: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 联合国人权事务委员会认定，对巴西前总统卢拉的起诉侵犯了他获得公平审判的权利、隐私权和政治权利。
description.en: The UN Human Rights Committee found that the prosecution of former Brazilian President Lula violated his right to a fair trial, his right to privacy, and his political rights.

relationships.source: 2022年巴西大选
relationships.target: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 卢拉在2022年巴西总统选举中获胜，开启了他的第三个总统任期。
description.en: Lula won the 2022 Brazilian presidential election, beginning his third term as president.

relationships.source: 2022年巴西大选

description.zh-cn: 时任总统雅伊尔·博索纳罗在2022年巴西总统选举中被卢拉击败，未能成功连任。
description.en: Incumbent President Jair Bolsonaro was defeated by Lula in the 2022 Brazilian presidential election, failing to secure a second term.

relationships.source: 雅伊尔·博索纳罗

description.zh-cn: 博索纳罗就任总统后，任命了在“洗车行动”中审判卢拉的法官塞尔吉奥·莫罗为司法和公共安全部长。
description.en: After taking office, President Bolsonaro appointed Sérgio Moro, the judge who tried Lula in 'Operation Car Wash', as Minister of Justice and Public Security.

relationships.source: 迪尔玛·罗塞夫
relationships.target: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

position.zh-cn: 民政院首席部长（幕僚长）
position.en: Chief of Staff of the Presidency

description.zh-cn: 迪尔玛·罗塞夫在卢拉的总统任期内曾担任其幕僚长。
description.en: Dilma Rousseff served as Lula's Chief of Staff during his presidency.

relationships.source: 2023年巴西国民议会遭冲击事件
relationships.target: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 该事件是前总统博索纳罗的支持者发起的，旨在抗议卢拉当选总统，对其执政构成挑战。
description.en: This event was initiated by supporters of former President Bolsonaro to protest Lula's election as president, posing a challenge to his administration.

relationships.source: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 卢拉在其总统任内推行了“零饥饿计划”社会福利项目。
description.en: During his presidency, Lula implemented the 'Fome Zero' social welfare program.

relationships.source: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 卢拉在其总统任内推行了“家庭补助金”社会福利项目。
description.en: During his presidency, Lula implemented the 'Bolsa Família' social welfare program.

relationships.source: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦
relationships.target: 玛丽亚·德·卢尔德·里贝罗

relationships.source: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦
relationships.target: 马利萨·莱蒂西亚·达席尔瓦

relationships.source: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦
迪尔玛·罗塞夫

description.zh-cn: 巴西前总统迪尔玛·罗塞夫于2023年出任新开发银行行长。
description.en: Former Brazilian President Dilma Rousseff became the President of the New Development Bank in 2023.

relationships.source: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 2023年2月，卢拉在白宫与美国总统乔·拜登会面。
description.en: In February 2023, Lula met with U.S. President Joe Biden at the White House.

relationships.source: 路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦

description.zh-cn: 2008年，卢拉在日本举行的八国集团会议上与时任美国总统乔治·沃克·布什会面。
description.en: In 2008, Lula met with then-U.S. President George W. Bush at the G8 summit in Japan.
